acetic_acid.details: made from glacial acetic acid or store-bought white vinegar

yield.details: after washing with water and ethanol, then drying overnight at 60 °C
large-scale synthesis, after washing with water and ethanol, then drying overnight at 60 °C

hydrothermal_conditions.details: for larger crystals (> 2 µm) as a phase-mixture

3DED.details: with Timepix detector, continuously rotating the crystal at 0.45° s−1

PXRD.high_resolution: collected at 11BM at the APS, Argonne National Laboratory, USA

characterization.TGA: TA Instruments Discovery TGA, heated in air from 28 °C to 600 °C

stability_and_porosity.sorption_properties: Micromeritics ASAP2020 surface area and porosity analyzer
stability_and_porosity.stability_in_solvents_and_solutions: 1 mL of each respective solvent or solution was added and stirred at room temperature or 80 °C for 24 h
stability_and_porosity.stability_in_L-cysteine_and_L-cystine: 1 mg mL-1 of the material in water, stirred at 37 °C for 24 h
stability_and_porosity.pH_dependent_stability: 20 mg of as-synthesized SU-101 was immersed in 3 mL of stock solution, prepared from either NaOH or concentrated HCl

biocompatibility.cell_culture: HL-60 cell lines cultured in RPMI 1640 medium
biocompatibility.cytotoxicity_studies: MTT assay, cells seeded 24h prior to the assay in 96-well plates at a density of 1 × 105 cells per well

SO2_and_H2S_capture.SO2_capture: Dynamic Gravimetric Gas/Vapour Sorption Analyser, DVS vacuum
SO2_and_H2S_capture.H2S_breakthrough_experiments: HP 5890 GC, lab-made system for dynamic breakthrough experiments
